title: Insertions and Upgrades (SSDLC)
description: Secure upgrades, insertions, and patching are required for maintaining application security and keeping software up to date.
key-ideas: The security of the upgrades and patches must be similarly guaranteed for the application to maintain its security.
Changes must be thoroughly documented for each insertion, upgrade, or patch.
All insertions, patches, and upgrades must be properly signed by the developer/vendor.
Signature validation ensures package integrity; updates are not corrupted or modified and are from a trusted source.
